website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality seat protector that stays where you put it and won't bleed onto your upholstery, although it may leave indentations.
pros: Dual grip traction does a good job keeping it from sliding around
cons: Some reports of the rubber pads on the bottom of this option damaging leather seats (marks, indentations)
Some buyers say that this protector doesn't fit well and sits awkwardly on the seat

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for leather- stretching and permanent marks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover to protect the seats in our expensive 2018 SUV. After 1 week of them being installed the horrible X design has stretched and depressed the leather. The purpose of these is to protect your interior and the design leads this to fail miserably. Our other SUV has had a car seat in it for 10 months without half of the stretching this has caused in 1 week. Stay clear of this product, particularly with leather interiors, and be suspect of all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: NCSurf

customer_reviews.title: Rubber pads damaged our leather seats
customer_reviews.text: I'll be throwing these away unless Brica would like to refund our money. The main (maybe the only) job of these is to protect our seats, and they did the opposite. See the attached picture. In hindsight, it seems obvious that the bottom of a seat protector should probably be flat, and the rubber pads that protrude are just asking to have your seats damaged. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Once I removed the seat there was a pretty decent amount slushing around on this seat protector
customer_reviews.text: A massive puke happened while this was on the seat. I didn't think the puke went beyond the child's lap and the baby seat. Once I removed the seat there was a pretty decent amount slushing around on this seat protector. But none on my fancy premium leather seats! Regarding the printing/indentation onto the seats, yes, they leave a print. However within 24hrs the indentation was gone. The protector had been in place undisturbed for 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for underneath my car seat attached using latch system
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect the leather car seats in my 2015 Toyota Highlander. My SUV has 2nd row captains chairs - not the bench seat. The protector doesn't leave marks behind after taking it out and keeps my granddaughter's feet off the seat back. It's easy to wipe down and after time, the front section does relax enough to lay down against the front of the seat cushion. Since I intended to attach the car seat using the latch system (and not the seat belt) this fit my needs. If you intend to secure your car seat using the seat belt, I will tell you that this protector extends over the belt buckle and will not accommodate that.
customer_reviews.author: Jo D

customer_reviews.title: Bad product design
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to protect my new Lexus seats from getting messed up from a car seat. I had this installed for 1 week on a trip to Florida. I moved the car seat over to a new spot and when I removed this, I was surprised to find out THIS thing left indentions in my seat!! What is the purpose of this thing if it also leaves indentions and stretches my leather seats?! Try another product that doesn’t have plastic inserts on the underside that WILL mess up your leather seats.
customer_reviews.author: TJ&Julee

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the car seat cleaner and in better condition than without.
customer_reviews.text: The wife likes to give our daughter snacks in the car seat and I got tired of cleaning up the mess (we have leather or whatever vw calls their stuff) so it's not tooo difficult but still annoying as some stuff dries hard. Also our girl gets her shoes dirty and then kicks the seat (she's rear facing in the vw) and this now captures that dirt and keeps the leather stuff looking new. Our neighbor actually had this on her registry and we got it for them and after I looked at it I said, heck this should work for our car so I bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: Notabiker

customer_reviews.title: Initially it seemed like a good investment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this seat protector a year ago. Initially it seemed like a good investment. It was easy to install and kept the car seat in place. My main complaints: 1. The material at the edges hasn't held up well to sunlight exposure. I just took the cover out to clean and noticed the edges disintegrating into powder leaving nasty stains on the seat. 2. The marks on the seat at the bottom are quite prominent. Wondering if this protector helped at all. 3. The rubber feet at the bottom have gotten disfigured due to weight of the car seat. Many quality and design issues. Will look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Well, I went to clean my car and kids car seats after 5 months of 2 of the exact same car seats next to each other by fully removing everything, and what do you know the seat protector left more damage on my new car leather seats than the Nuna car seat by itself. I won’t be reinstalling it back into my car after my Carwash. The one and only plus point is that when my youngest daughter was facing rear seat, it protected her shoe dirt from getting on the top of the seat her feet was resting on.
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Seat Saver!
customer_reviews.text: When we were trading in our car (somewhat spur of the moment) and were taking out our children's car seats and booster seats- what was underneath was ridiculous! The children's car seats had left a big impression in the leather seats due to weight and the mess left behind was disgusting. It goes to say that it was a big lesson learned....so we bought these car seat protectors for our new car. I could not be happier with our purchase! We drive a suburban and these fit on the seats perfectly! When I take the children's car seats out now everything still looks brand new! I highly recommend this to anyone who has kids! Love, love, love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ninjapanda60Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Definite must for anybody with carseats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my leather seats. After having a sippy cup spill in the car seat, it happens but the smell of milk soaked into the seat had to be professionally detailed to get rid of the smell. I bought this and sure enough after a few days of installation it happened again. Luckily this protector not only stopped the milk from getting in the seat but also confined the milk to the pad itself which made for easy cleanup. Also it helps with random cheerioes and raisins that may fall behind the seat. Also when i need to remove the carseat i dont have the impressions on the seat from where the carseat was.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have to Protect your Leather!
customer_reviews.text: We have leather seats in our cars and we noticed that some edges of our car seats are quite sharp and it would only be common sense to expect that it may leave some permanent damage if we kept the car seats on without any type of protection. I noticed that this was a popular solution and now that I've used it for about a year, I can honestly say that this product is great! Easy to clean, looks great, and really durable. I added an extra layer of towel underneath this as well, but it was probably not necessary. Every time I take off the car seat and this car seat protector, my leather still looks new! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SuperMom Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and fits well in the back seat
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and fits well in the back seat. I am using it with a booster seat that has a back on it. I have an Infinity QX30 with a smaller back seat. It fits well and does not interfere with the seat belt buckle. The fit is secure and you can tell it will not slide around. We also like the front panel that protects from shoe contact. This is more expensive than others but worth the money. Easy to install. Prevents booster seat from sliding around. Stays firmly in place. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura  A. Priebe

customer_reviews.title: The best for leather seats
customer_reviews.text: The best option for leather seats that I have found. Yes, I have removed them and besides the slight indent from the blue grippers, no damage or residue to leather seats. The base is a bit wide for the rear middle seat - makes it difficult to access the buckle for use. I two in a volvo xc70 with a clek foonf (middle) and nuna pipa (behind drivers), all rear facing. These do raise the seat so if using latch system some persistence and pushing is needed to make it all work.
customer_reviews.author: ICU812MI

customer_reviews.title: Makes car seat not as safe
customer_reviews.text: We bought this car seat protector for our Uppababy MESA in my Toyota RAV4. When we got the car seat inspected, the inspector told us that this makes the car seat base not as stable and actually that our car seat isn’t designed to have a protector underneath it. At that point, we decided it’s not worth it to have an item that will make our car seat any less safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just keep buying these
customer_reviews.text: I will run out of room for car seats at some point but as a grand parent you are happy to have more. These work great to keep the seat protected from spills and stains but they are so thick and sturdy that the car seats don't leave any indentions in the leather seats at all. We take them in and out a lot because of only have the grandchildren on weekends and they are super easy to install. Just waiting on the day when I have to but another one because we get the good news that we will have more grand babies.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to protect my new Kia Sedona's leather seats in the back. My child seat really digs into the seat and creates an imprint that can't be good for resale. This seat protector is the real deal. It's nice and thick to help spread out the pressure from the dent my child seat is trying to make. It has a nice large size that covers the whole seat well and it has a nice strap on the top to keep the thing close to the seat. It does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Best car seat protector
customer_reviews.text: We've had 3 different cars, 3 kids, and 4 different car seats that have used these mats. They have been through so much and I can say without a doubt they are the best. They are sturdy and durable. From breast milk, snow, throw up, dirt, mud, food, and so much more these have kept our actual car seats in perfect condition. We *just* had to buy a new one after 4 years and that was only because I tried to wash it in the washing machine which I don't think you're even allowed to do so totally on me.
customer_reviews.author: A&MW11

customer_reviews.title: Will Damage Leather Seats...
customer_reviews.text: The other other negative reviews about this product damaging our seats are true. Pressure and weight is distributed across the "X" shape rubber pads causing deep indentations/impressions in my car's leather seats. So while it protects your car's seats, it also "damages" it as well. Not It would have been a better product without the rubber inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Indents on seat?
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to install, the fastener goes under the headrest. The material seems to be very strong. The mat does eliminate the indent from the car seat base into my leather seats. However, It left a big “X” indent on my seats from the blue gripping rubbers underneath the seat mat.
customer_reviews.author: Bumble Bee

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 and counting, best guard!
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to clean definitely have to spot clean immediately for any spills etc but absolutely does it’s hob. Has saved my car from many milk spills and juice spills plenty of crumbs and of course the car seat indents itself. The kick guard is perfect for rainy weather and outdoorsy lifestyle. And there isn’t an odd gap, just enough to use buckles where necessary. We bought one then needed 3 more! Worth every penny to protect the car in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Fits, no sliding, not rubber!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these today in my smaller SUV. At first I though they were too wide, until I actually put the car seats back in. Was a able to get a snug install of both infant seat and convertible seat with no sliding. Beautiful color. I was however surprised by the material. From the pictures I was expecting these to be rubber. They are not! They have tightly woven fabric finish, which I suppose will be good for absorbing liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Heytherewhiskey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy...
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice and thick. Seems to be made well, good quality. I haven't used it for too long but car seat fits well over it. It doesnt slip or slide, stays in place well. I haven't checked the seat underneath yet but I'm assuming that it will keep my leather seats protected. Did alot of research before purchasing this and I'm very happy that I choose this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeepet76

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: We've used this to protect the leather rear seats in our cars for over 4 years now and we just purchased a second one for our other car. They do a terrific job protecting the underlying seat from car seat chafing damage. Whenever I've pulled the child's car seat and this protector, the leather seat surface below still looks pristine. They are well constructed, durable, and may be scrubbed down as required with no ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave in a hot car.  Terrible rubber smell.
customer_reviews.text: We newly installed 2 of these in my car before we left it at the airport for a week. When we returned the off gassing fumes were horrible. We took them out but smell had soaked into my new-ish car's leather seats and has taken >3 weeks to mostly dissipate (I can still smell it if the car has been parked in the sun for a while, and I'm not a super smell-sensitive person). Smell obviously coming from the blue non-skid pads. Unusable. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Covers entire seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat protector. We originally had the prince lion heart version and it didn’t cover the entire back of the seat. I stumbled upon this one and immediately liked how it covers the entire seat. It was super easy to install and it has a strap that goes around the headrest to secure the seat cover in place. So far it has exceeded our other seat cover and I’m really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mel KTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Catches Liquids Pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to have a water repellent coating and/or inherent properties to make liquid cleanup easier. Also has stiffened raised edges to keep things on the protector. Kid had an 'accident' in the car seat and this was the only thing saving our car seats from being soaked and our interior altered with a permanent scented reminder. The thickness of the protector is decent, but wish it was just a bit more. Also wish there was a head-rest protector included, as our car seat leans against the head rest (especially with the top restraining latch).
customer_reviews.author: Deuxieme

customer_reviews.title: Can never go wrong with this brand
customer_reviews.text: This is really the brand I trust the most as far as car seat protection goes because I am also very particular about making sure that whatever is under the car seat is not going to change its safety. And this is the only one I trust. I have gotten cheaper versions, because there are some out there, but when it comes to babies and kids paying a little bit more for something you know is best quality is no issue for me. would highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Hoodschwinked

customer_reviews.title: We didn't put a barrier on the seat since she's sat in and the car seat got super black and dirty
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is still rear facing and she's 2. We didn't put a barrier on the seat since she's sat in and the car seat got super black and dirty. We had to buy fabric stain remover and washed the car seat and then out this on. This is a great product. It's nice quality rubber and easy to put on. I put the car seat back on top and now it's protecting our car seat from all the shoe dirt.
customer_reviews.author: PCTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not exactly what its for
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality but the green plastic strip still giving mark on the leather. Better than nothing i guess but quality of the material is very nice and luxury. Price wise little expensive for just the seat protector.
customer_reviews.author: Taner Ortac

customer_reviews.title: Does not eliminate printing!
customer_reviews.text: The base needs thicker softer padding to reduce printing on the seat. On top of the base needs to be firmer. The toe kick flap needs to be more flexible because it just sticks out and is in the way. I bought this to hopefully eliminate printing on my brand new seats...but this is not really better then just towels and a piece of cardboard. Not happy with it. The people who design these things ....what are they thinking!?
customer_reviews.author: cab door man

customer_reviews.title: Every parent should get one of this for their car
customer_reviews.text: I like it that it keeps my seats clean, it keeps thebcarseat from making marks on the leather of the car. I use it in the back seat of a Sierra 1500 crew cab. It looks like a high quality product and matches my vehicle style. It's just a matter of time until one of your kids throws up in the car or has an accident. This makes it easier to cleanup and keep your vehicle looking newer longer.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom1024

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy but rubber grips damage soft leather
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cover over many others I tried given how thick it was to prevent damage to the seats from the car seat. While the product is thick, the x pattern that is on the bottom creates sharp edges that put x patterns in the seats. Mostly goes away over time or if you take the seat out in hot weather but won’t risk it again.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son who is expecting his first child. Well his first child is his new F-150! He is obsessed with this truck and wanted something sturdy to put the baby car seat on and to protect the leather of the truck seat. It is sturdy, fits great, no slipping or sliding and will protect the leather from stains and damage. Every new dad with a truck needs one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great Protector!
customer_reviews.text: Love these seat protectors. We now own 4 of them and my friends who have them also love them. I needed something that covered the entire back seat for my extended rear facing carseats (I still have my 3 year old rear facing) so dirty shoes were always present. These are water repellant and catch all the crumbs, sand, and dirt all while staying in place and protecting my seats. I've had two of them for 2.5 years and they're still going strong. The material is quite tough and rigid so I know these will last the life span of my kids in carseats. Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ahilder

customer_reviews.title: The best seat protectors.
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit pricey, but the best seat protectors. We have 3 carseats in the car and found the were rubbing into the seats and leaving permanent indents in the interior. Not to mention small food items or spills from the kiddos they dropped we're getting stuck under the carseat. We have three of these and fit well and with the blue Cross rubber on the bottom for support, it keeps the carseats from digging into the seats and leaving indents. When we clean them, we just hose them down and wipe (sometimes scrub) and easy to put back in..
customer_reviews.author: NetzerFamily

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest for rear-facing car seats
customer_reviews.text: I bought another one of the other no name brand covers, and it works fine for front-facing seats but provided almost no protection for our rear-facing seat. This one is much stiffer and seems like it provides much better protection. The stiffer material and solid paneling disperse the pressure of the seat much better.
customer_reviews.author: technis

customer_reviews.title: Does let the car seat slide around some in the seat needs something to make it stay to the seat better.
customer_reviews.text: I just love this. Just got it so I'm not sure how it keeps the car seat from putting indents on my seats so we will see but it does catch the little snack messes pretty good and very easy to clean. One negative about it is that I constantly have to check my car seat straps because with this under the car seat it tends to let the car seat move around and not stay put and still so I'm always having the check and make sure everything stays tight.
customer_reviews.author: Miclilmac

customer_reviews.title: Leaves marks on leather
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cover except for the marks left on leather seats other have complained about. I’ve had these out over a month and the marks are still there but maybe less deep. Hoping it one day goes away. Deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended car seat protector
customer_reviews.text: Li bought a "cheap" car seat protector and it left terrible indents in my seat from the car seat. When I bought a car with leather seats, I was terrified this would happen again so i spent the little extra money and let me tell you. This car seat.protector is sooooo worth it! No dents, creases, stains, nothing on my car seat and I have a 3 year old destructive toddler. Kudos Brica. Now if you could invent a cover for the over the search latch then we would be in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat protector
customer_reviews.text: This seat protector is made of a durable material. The underneath of this seat protector is not abrasive which is important since this is going on a leather seat. It has an overhang that protects the seat from dirt and damage from kids shoes. The seat has a strap that holds the back up. It is adjustable and fits around the headrest. This is a nice feature since some seat protectors don't have this and if used with a booster rather than full car seat tends to fall forward or side to side. I would recommend this seat protector.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Great For Rear Facing Toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for rear facing toddlers who put their shoes all over your seat! They were a little too tall for my husband's Chevy Silverado 3500 (but still do the job!) but fit PERFECT in my Chevy Tahoe. I'm one of the keep my kid rear facing as long as possible type so these are great! Greta quality, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linsey Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Install before your kid is even born.  Not a 100% solution, but better than other soft products, and 1000x better than nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two...one for each car. Wish we'd bought them when our kid was born.....not when he was two and a half. We had dents in the seat material of our two cars from car seats....I'm not sure these would have prevented it 100%....but it definitely wouldn't have been as bad. These seem to distribute the pressure from the car seats more evenly....so any disfiguring of your seats isn't as bad....or at least is less noticeable. We have another on the way and I will buy two more of these. We were given some other flimsy ones as a hand-me down....but there's no comparing those soft ones to these. The material is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DDG

customer_reviews.title: A must have for light colored interiors.  Protects leather or seatback fabric.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I now have one under each car seat. Seconds to install. They offer good protection for the seat. Especially good for rear facing car seats, where the seat back may be subject to damage from kicking and from shoes. I have a soft light leather interior and consider these a must have. With my front facing seat, I also have a less expensive one that hooks over the front seat headrest, and protects the back of the front seat, from kicking.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We really liked that a car seat manufacturer created these, but were a little hesitant because there are cheaper options. This is definitely worth the money. Protects the leather seats from indentations and spills. It makes the car seats feel more secure than if they were on the bare seat. I would absolutely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have had these in both our cars for two years now, and purchased again because we liked it so much. Really protects the seat well and holds up to serious abuse from kids. Wipes clean very easily and has been a great investment to protect our car upholstery from the sharp plastic edges found on many child seats.
customer_reviews.author: NorCalFox

customer_reviews.title: This does a good job of protecting the seats from car seat indentions
customer_reviews.text: I think this protector is okay. I purchased it to protect the leather seats of my new car. I learned my lesson from not having one in my last car. This does a good job of protecting the seats from car seat indentions. I do think this works better for rear facing car seats. My son's convertible car seat doesn't seem to completely fit within the diameter of the base. The picture also shows the front protector is supposed to lay down over the bottom cushion of the seat. Mine is really stiff and sticks straight out.
customer_reviews.author: Phil W.

customer_reviews.title: really do protect the seats!
customer_reviews.text: I had these installed for almost three years, When I took them off my seat was still in great shape and clean! this product isn't the easiest to clean but I would much rather scrub it then car seats ruining my seats or having to scrub my seats!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Amazing protection at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing way to protect your car's upolstery. Our daughter can freely place her feet in her rear facing car seat and not dirty the car. Damp cloth is sufficient to wipe any reasonable mess clean. The base also protects the baby seat from poking into the leather and the silicone "x" prevents the baby's seat from moving. The extended flap will likely protect the edge of the car seat from dirt as it provides a nice shroud over the edge. Definitely a must if you want to protect your car's upolstery from the damage a baby's car seat can do, not to mention the baby itself!
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I did so much research and ultimately decided on this one, I was able to install car seat base over it no problem and it does. not. budge. They also must have changed the way it is packaged, because the kick flap lays perfectly flat against the seat, not straight out like other reviewers mentioned. It doesn’t have the giant brica label across the back like in online pictures (which I didn’t like). So far it’s perfect! Matches our mocha gray leather interior perfectly. Great quality. Will update if it leaves indents on leather seats.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Leather Seats!
customer_reviews.text: Saved my leather seats from my 2 year old's potty accident! I had to get a new vehicle due to my previous vehicle getting totaled in a car accident. I ordered the car seat replacements and the seat protectors at the same time. This seat covers the entire area of my 2nd row bucket seat in my suburban. 2 days of having her new Britax Pioneer she had a potty accident. I removed the car seat and the pee did not soak through the protector. All I had to do was unbuckle the headrest strap and fold it down to remove without spilling.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Work well, recommend for larger vehicles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my new Suburban to protect the two bucket seats that the children's' booster seats sit on. After reading a lot of mixed reviews, I went ahead and purchased them knowing if need be I could place a towel under them for extra protection. So far I have not needed to do so and I have black leather seats. They collect the stray crumbs and dirt well, and they are easy to take in and out of the car when needed.
customer_reviews.author: M.N.Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy car seats!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat protector. This help prevent our leather seats from being damaged and worn out by the kids heavy car seat. Constantly taking out the Heavy car seat had ruined one side of our back seat and boy we weren’t happy about it. With this car seat guard it prevents that from happening on the other side of our back seat. Very easy to install and clean! Love it
customer_reviews.author: N.T.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Loves these seat covers, I install them on top of a whole seat cover basically like double layer it. But I had another one installed when we only had one kid and it was right on my leather seat and I didnt have the issues other reviews have stated.
customer_reviews.author: JP2

customer_reviews.title: Great seat protector
customer_reviews.text: Great seat protector! Heavy duty and durable. I currently use it under a booster seat. With the food and drink my grade schooler consumes, this helps eliminate the need to have to vacuum all the time. I simply remove it and shake it out like you would a floor mat. If you do get liquid on it, it has the small lip to prevent liquids from getting to your seat. Simply wipe the liquid up.
customer_reviews.author: JCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Brica Great Protector
customer_reviews.text: Large seat protectors that stay put, protect seat, and are easy to clean. Protect infant seat through larger toddler seat, complete coverage of car seat area. Durable and light. May have rubbery smell when removed from box - air out first beofre putting in your vehicle. Used in a mid size SUV, likely will protect seat in Escalade or Suberban as well. It has not stopped dent in seat from child seat feet, but reduced dents greatly. This is a major concern for leather seats, especially in winter when humidity drops. (Treat your leather seating with OEM approved leather care treatement for your car to prolong life and increase durability.)
customer_reviews.author: Luker

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for auto seat upholstery
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to protect the rear leather seat in our Toyota RAV4 when we installed a semi-permanent child car seat (Graco Extend2Fit Convertible). The protector was very easy to install, however the bottom seemed a little short once we extended the car seat's adjustable leg rest. We found the back of the car seat's base was riding on the flap that is supposed to drape over the lip of the auto's seat. Despite that, it works fine and offers solid protection for our seat leather.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Best seat protector out there.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these seat protectors. I have one for my son's carseat and will be purchasing a second for the new baby on the way. They are water resistant, durable and it collects the crumbs and crackers that my son throws over. It's easy to clean ans drys fast if some liquid dries up on it. Before I bought the brica one, I had bought a lionheart seat protector from Wal-Mart, but that one was smaller and less sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this brand because I thought the thick rubber would be easy to wipe off and that it would be less likely for my car seat to slide around. So far I've had it for a few weeks and I'm very happy! It's going from winter snow to mud season now and since my 2yr old is rear facing she has her feet up against the back of my seat! I am looking at buying a 2nd one to put in our other car.
customer_reviews.author: L. FicksTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for leather seats!
customer_reviews.text: I have an Acura MDX which has leather bucket seats in the back. The seat protector I was using made it nearly impossible to install my RF convertible car seat correctly With this one I pulled to tighten the belt once and that's all it took! I did my research with this one and definitely made the right decision!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great seat protectors
customer_reviews.text: These are super covers for our seats which protect from the car seat. I have used other seat protectors before but these are actually large enough to protect both the upper and lower portion of the seat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: neal

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Work as described. Pros- its durable and big enough to cover the car seat. Easy to clean Cons- kinda rigid, will leave marks on the car seat. Otherwise, it is okay. Easy to clean and color match with my truck’s interior.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy S.

customer_reviews.title: this seat protector has done a great job protecting our leather seats in both of our ...
customer_reviews.text: this seat protector has done a great job protecting our leather seats in both of our vehicles. It spreads out the load of the car seat so it doesnt leave huge dents in the leather. The bottom is not fully water proof as the 4 rubber feet are removable. The outside is water repellent. We have washed this one time, took it to the car wash and hung it up next to the floor mats and sprayed it down. It cleaned off easily and completely. Very satisfied with our purchase and recommend this to any of our friends or family that are expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best seat protector, and I have tried many.
customer_reviews.text: The more firm the base of a car seat protector is, the better it works in protecting the seats in the long run. Try it for yourself. I could not find a car seat protector that was a better mix of firmness and pliability for the proper figment of child seats. Most protectors are very thin and will leave pressure points/imprints of the car seat base in your car seat once removed. That's why it's better to have a more firm base. Out of the 5 brands I tried, this one made the least amount of imprints on the car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: my absolute favorite seat protector. I have had this for 3 yrs with my oldest & now have another for our new baby. its thick so it protects the seats from indentions. easy to vacuum clean & wipe clean. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke T.

customer_reviews.title: Love these! They hold up very well!
customer_reviews.text: We've had these in our van for a few months and so far so good. The leather still looks new below it they are holding up great. We commute pretty often so my seats see a lot of wear and this has totally been saving our new leather seats. Will be buying a third soon for the new baby's car seat. Also I was able to get a great and tight install and had no issues or concerns for car seat safety. In fact these protectors help keep our car seats f sliding on the leather therefore creating a better fit/install of our car seats
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: check car seat instructions 1st
customer_reviews.text: But be aware- My daughter-in-law said I was not to put this under the Graco carseat. I don't remember why so check before buying. I wound up taking mine to a resale shop and only got peanuts even though it was unopened
customer_reviews.author: Joyce K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love these.....
customer_reviews.text: We have one for almost all our car seats. We recently had to get another one for my mother in laws car. The car seat booster put a few holes in her leather seat. Crazy right, but hey its a Chrysler, what are you going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Great protection from damage by child safety seats.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know about these until my son showed me his. I bought a pair to put in my new van; which has leather seats. They installed easily and they protect my leather seats from the ravages of one forward facing and one rear facing carseat. The base reduces slippage and the peripheral ridgeline keeps food drink spills contained. With a rear facing car seat, the seat protectors' seat back section provides protection from the kiddos scuffing their shoes on the upholstery. Wish I had these 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Mattison

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for my mini van
customer_reviews.text: This seat protector fits the 2nd row side seats in my 2018 Honda odyssey perfectly. I use this mat to prevent my toddlers carseat from creating dents in the leather. It also does a good job catching spills and crumbs too. I bought a 2nd one in hopes to protect the other 2nd row side seat, however when sat in, it slides out of place. I had to return the 2nd one. Over all, great for carseats.
customer_reviews.author: hellopk

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality seat protector that won't slide around when you install the carseat tightly. The back portion seems long and bunches up a bit on my fullsize pickup but it doesn't affect the use.
customer_reviews.author: Batman2190

customer_reviews.title: Works but needs isolating padding
customer_reviews.text: To avoid damage to my leather seats I installed this protector with two folded hand towels between the shield and the seat to keep the rubber strips from leaving stretched deformation of the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great vehicle protection
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these. We would have three but the middle of the bench seat doesn't have the headrest in the same spot as the outer seats in my Honda Pilot. It keeps my seats from having the kids little shoes on them and the rubber grips keep the seat from sliding around. If the seat is installed correctly, they shouldn't move much anyway BUT this little extra grip is nice. We've had one of these for three years and the other for 10 months, both still look brand new and I can't tell which we've had longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Booster seats
customer_reviews.text: The protector is nice quality and does the job HOWEVER it's not good for booster seats. My child has difficulty finding the buckle. The back narrows for anchor points but it does not consider the seatbelt buckles. Good for a Car Seat but not for a child that buckles there own seat. My application is a Yukon with Captains seats, so it's not like the seats are narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one five years ago for baby #1, and another now for baby #2. Great quality. It does get in the way of the buckle under toddler seat. The grips help so much! You can really get the carseat tighter and it doesn't slide around.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting cloth or leather
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome for protecting our leather seats! It prevents the carseat base from damaging the leather seat, but will also definitely come in handy when baby gets a little older and can kick the backrest of the seat while rear-facing to prevent dirt and nastiness from the bottom of their shoes from getting on your cloth or leather seats. This is a great product if you care about your seats.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Wide for a standard size vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Gave a 4 because The area where you clip the care seat into the car is slightly wider than the where clips in both the car and the car seat are maki installing slightly annoying. I drive a Subaru Forester so it is a pretty standard size seat.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one design
customer_reviews.text: Super easy install and the connected design makes it impossible for my daughter, who is in a rear facing car seat, to kick it out of place. This happed quite a bit with other seat protectors that we have used. There are also groves to catch any spills, and the bottom is also rubberized to hold even liquid spills in place until you can get there to clean. We don't really give my daughter to many snacks or drinks in the car, so for us it is all about the portion that protects the back of the seat from her dirty shoes or her kicking.
customer_reviews.author: Roberts Family

customer_reviews.title: You need this.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot! They’ve really saved my leather seats from my kids’ car seats. They have some sharp points on the bottom and I was concerned about it tearing my seats. These seat covers help distribute that pressure. Sure it leaves a small outline where the “x” is. But let me tell you it’s better than the alternative 🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa M

customer_reviews.title: Helps protect leather and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 of these and they all work well. Durable material and stays put on the seat. These make quite a difference on our car seats, specifically with keeping the car lines from getting permanently imprinted into the leather. now if Brica could just keep my kids from putting their feet on the backs of the driver/passenger seats and stop throwing toys under my seats, I would be in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best Cover Out There
customer_reviews.text: Bought the older version of this Seat cover for car seats a while back and was happy to see this when both my boyfriend and parents bought a new car. Very durable material and can handle the weight and movement of the carseat and of an active toddler. Easy to install and a reliable cover.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about this product. Yes it protects the leather seats in my vehicle from the car seat base but... I don’t feel like I can get the car seat base snug enough against the seat now. There is a lot of additional wiggle room with the cover over the seat vs no seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Batliner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but it does not fit in cars ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install but it does not fit in cars that have bucket seats well. It does not contour to those kinds of seat. However, you can finagle it to fight. Fits well in my Honda Risgeline perfectly but so much on my wife’s 4 series. It does do a good job at protecting the leather from being scuffed from the car seat and from the baby kicking.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: These are very sturdy and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one of these a year ago for my toddler and just got another one for the new baby. Protect seats not only from some spills and crumbs but also protect your seats from having permanent dents from the car seat!! These are very sturdy and easy to install. You'll be able to get the seatbelt latched and/or reach your anchors but some cars may be more difficult. In my Camry, it was a little tricky but in my Subaru Outback, it's been super easy!
customer_reviews.author: KitchenDiva

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, But Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: The Brica seat protector is a little pricey compared to some other options on Amazon, but it’s worth it! I already had one and when my 2nd child was on the way I looked at amazon for other options and still nothing seemed to compare to this one. I have a full size HD pickup so the seats are very big in the back and the Brica protectors cover every inch of the seat with no problem. Other ones I looked at were not wide enough, didn’t come all the way up the back, etc. Very happy that I went with the Brica again!
customer_reviews.author: Frankf300

customer_reviews.title: Durable and covers all areas well.
customer_reviews.text: The material appears to be strong and durable and it covers the seat really well with our convertible car seat. We own a Graco Extendafit which extends the ability to stay a rear facing car seat longer and anticipated needing protection from little shoes high on the seat. This does the job and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Dawge

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in a 2014 Hyundai Genesis
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in a 2014 Hyundai Genesis. Protects well for any kind of car seat, have used with 3 different brands. If something does spill the edges contain the spill. Bought a second for the second kid, definitely recommend. Only downside is the front flap seems to always go up instead of down, loses its protection in this area where kids feet would dangle when they are older.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these! They are perfect for infant carseats up to booster. They keep our seats clean and add the extra protection from having wear or dents in the seats. Easily cleanable. we spray them off with a hose and they dry quickly. Perfect size and add lots of coverage. Easy to install and remove and has holes big enough to reach through the buckles or to latch the car seats in the car.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend and purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Protects seats really well. There was a strong smell when first opened from package but the smell has gone away. Very durable material and holds spilled water/juice. My only complaint is that it makes it harder to install/uninstall my toddler's convertable car seat due to it covering one of the LATCH points. I also have one under my infant's car seat base and have not had any interference with installation. I would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A&A's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought these years ago
customer_reviews.text: These have saved my leather seats - as parents you are pitched a bunch of useless crap like baby wipe warmers and a myriad of other useless and stupid products. However these are a must have. I wish I had know about them and purchased them way way sooner. If you haven't had the privilege as a father of trying to dig melted fruit snacks and puke from the corner of your seats then you don't know why you need this. But some day in the future you will have to do that and you will realize two things. 1. Kids are disgusting 2. you should have listened to me But this thing and change your life for the better.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Carr Superstar

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these, they’re awesome! They reduce the damage to your car’s upholstery from the car seat being tightly pressed into it. They’re also so durable and catch liquid spills! When I clean the car, I take these out and hose them down to wash out crumbs and dirt. They dry in the sun and look like new! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought! I have had the first one for 4 years and it has held up beautifully! Very durable and saves the interior of the car! Just great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and holds its shape
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Strong and sturdy holding it’s true shape. I wish there was an all black option but nonetheless it’s a great product. We currently have three of them and have been using them for over 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: R. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these it is so good. I bought another. There one in each vehicle. Very good if you have lether seats. It will protect them from baby car seats leaving marks
customer_reviews.author: jerome smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these in my car for a year now and still no dents in my leather seats from the car seats! The lip all the way around catches the majority of the spills, and when it’s time to clean them I just use a scrub brush and the garden hose. In short, a hog eating at a trough would leave less of a mess than my children do eating in the car, and these seat protectors make my seats look like they’venever seen a stray french fry. 😂
customer_reviews.author: chevygirl*85

customer_reviews.title: A must have for anyone with children.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 sons. A 4 year old, and a 19 month old. I had no idea what I was missing before I had these. These Brica seat protectors are a life saver. Whenever I clean my van out, I take the car seats out, and these contain everything that is spilled on it. These are also able to contain water, and keep them off the seats, which is very important with young children, as they spill and have accidents in the car, and being able to take these out, hose them down and let them dry instead of having to clean the seat saves me so much time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had cheap protectors before that are almost worthless... This one is worth the money. Much thicker, and is rigid yet flexible. Has nice indents to try to hold spilled liquids. These pads work much better on my leather seats to prevent my child seats from stretching/indenting the leather
customer_reviews.author: Sprink1es

customer_reviews.title: Strange color, but VERY good seat cover.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these seat covers. They are not the most fashionable cover, but they are very well made and sturdy. They are preventing spills on the car seats of my new car (with beige seats ...what was I thinking??) but are sturdy enough to prevent dents in the leather. They are very easy to install and do not appear to be leaving residue like some other reviews of OTHER seat covers mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Had a horrible smell upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Had a horrible smell upon arrival, but after a few days in the hot car in AZ heat it's completely normal now! Purchased for our Ford F150 which has leather seats, so we shall see if it leaves marks on the leather or not!
customer_reviews.author: C Mae

customer_reviews.title: as advertised but doesn't work with Chicco car seats
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this before we had our car seat inspected for correct installation. A certified car seat inspection technician told us that it depends on your car seat brand whether or not anything can be installed between the car seat base and the car. We have a Chicco KeyFit 30 and she told us that Chicco guidelines say the car seat or base should be installed directly (without any padding or protector on the seat). So check your car seat brand before ordering. The seat protector itself felt sturdy like it would do the intended job of protecting the car from crumbs, spills, etc. Unfortunately we will not be using ours since safety comes before cleanliness!
customer_reviews.author: IC

customer_reviews.title: Smells so bad
customer_reviews.text: Product came and smells TERRIBLE! Not sure where this was stored before it was shipped but the smell is very offensive.
customer_reviews.author: Clchamp

product_meta.title: Munchkin Brica Elite Seat Guardian Car Seat Protector, Crash Test Approved, Dark Grey, 1 Pack
product_meta.description: When you're a family on the go, kids and car seats can be hard on your car's upholstery. The Seat Guardian helps you keep it looking like new. The Easy clean Grime guard fabric keeps dirt and spills off your seats and provides essential protection against compression of fabric or leather. Cookies, crackers and juice even stay off your floor with the spill and crumb catcher. With a sturdy, unique design and extra tall back panel, the Seat Guardian is built to last so you can use it with all of your car seats as your baby grows, from birth to eight years. Safety is our priority so the crash tested Dual Grip Traction technology helps prevent the car seat from unwanted movement to help keep your child's seat in the proper position. The rear facing kick mat even helps you follow best safety practices by protecting your seats so you can keep your toddler in a rear facing seat longer.The product measures 45" L x 20" W.
feature_bullets: The product measures 45 inch Length x 20 inch Width.
Color safe construction won't bleed onto upholstery
Dual grip traction technology grips on both sides to help minimize unwanted car safety seat movement
Rear facing kick mat provides complete seat back coverage. Vinyl material
Unique one piece design is compatible with all car seats
Easy clean grime guard fabric protects your car

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,044 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
